description:
Bananya and Baby Sweet come across a coffin in a dark, gloomy mansion. As Bananya carefully investigates, a strange shadow appears behind him! Startled, the duo runs away as quickly as they can, but more mysterious shadows appear one after another, refusing to let them get away! Can Bananya and Baby Sweet escape the mansion?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: ハロー・ハロウィン, にゃ!
